website_summaries.verdict: One of Fresh's more affordable products that leaves skin clean and soft.
pros: Effectively cleans away makeup, oil, and dirt without drying skin
Includes amino acids to improve skin's elasticity
Cucumber extract soothes skin and gives a gentle scent
Gel cleanser is great for sensitive skin
cons: Not ideal for oily skin as it may not clean away enough oil and is not oil-free

customer_reviews.title: makes my face feel amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this facial cleanser every night before bed as a skincare regime to help make my skin awesome! So far I have definitely seen improvements. My fiance also used it once and loved it. This is coming from a guy who hates oily and heavy things on his face (hes super picky)
customer_reviews.author: samantha ross

customer_reviews.title: Like Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I have used this face cleanser for several years. I reorder once a year. It is a mild soap free wash. Some cleansers irritate or break rash but not Fresh. It cleans gently and completely.
customer_reviews.author: Availing

customer_reviews.title: Easily removes make up including mascara
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a free sample and had to have more! Easily removes make up including mascara. Minimizes breakouts and leaves your skin feeling fresh and smooth. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: Love Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I love Fresh Products and have been using this facia cleaner for a long time. Delivery was quick. Would order gain for sure.
customer_reviews.author: David Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Non irritating
customer_reviews.text: GENTLE, great cleaner for my older skin and my 20 something daughters skin- a little bit high on the price point, but I will buy again for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: motherbear

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and gently. Only downside is it doesn’t always remove mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Keila

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but very effective - I buy over and over
customer_reviews.text: This facewash gets all your makeup off so gently and doesn't dry out your face at all. It's got a light cucumbery scent. Just feels healthy.
customer_reviews.author: RockCityBB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A+++ this is the only face wash my girlfriend will use!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Frias

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and love it. Now I have the luxury of having it delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Buchenberger

customer_reviews.title: but so far i love it. Feems soft a d hydratung and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive only been using this for about a week, but so far i love it. Feems soft a d hydratung and the scent is very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Ferrucci

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face wash
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this over and over. Tried cheaper face washes and nothing makes my face glow and blemishes disappear like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fresh leaves face feeling "fresh".
customer_reviews.text: Love it / a gentle cleanser which leaves my face feeling "fresh"! Just wish it didn't cost so much! I use it twice each day so it doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Benton

customer_reviews.title: The ability to remove make-up and the clean feeling after.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for five years and love it. I can definitely tell the difference when it is not available for cleansing my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding soaps that work for my skin type. I had to buy very expensive soaps and was recommended to try this one. This one works great and is very affordable. I've been using it for over 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Margot Romer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I have sensitive skin and this does not dry face, and your face feels clean after using.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Feels AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this product makes your skin feel so fresh, has a cucumber feel to it, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Maynard

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. I would probably try the strawberry face wash as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Santos-Claro

customer_reviews.title: Best face was I ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin but when I use this face wash daily my skin is so clear and soft. I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Crowley

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, isn’t very thick in texture. Didn’t dry out my skin like others do. Doesn’t last very long though for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the only items that keeps my acne under control.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Just wish it cost a little less.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Benton

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I like this produce and find it so efficient for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Mirna ghais

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great at taking make-up and eye make-up off (light application but not for heavy eye makeup).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the BEST. I feel like it both cleanses AND soothes ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the BEST. I feel like it both cleanses AND soothes my skin. My face actually feels hydrated when I rinse it off, but doesn't feel greasy. I wish I could EAT this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Champion

customer_reviews.title: this price is not quiet reasonable though i love this product every much
customer_reviews.text: it is only 38 dollars in every store, this price is not quiet reasonable though i love this product every much, 4 star just because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: jia

customer_reviews.title: Fresh cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years and Its my favorite. It is gentle yet very cleansing. I dont use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Facial Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Gently cleanses while retaining moisture. It is a bit expensive, but I feel the product is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mohlman

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash. It smells great and doesn't dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hunziker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this product in sample size and I really liked it. It left my face feeling clean, fresh, and soft. Most products tend to dry or irritate my skin, but this one does the job perfectly. I truly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: It really does remove all your makeup and it's safe for your eyes. Just not crazy about the smell. Otherwise a great product with no drying residue.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia V Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. It's the only cleanser for me
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: I love the feel of this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this cleanser, and it takes very little to wash my face, which is good since it's spendy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Eide

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels great after each wash with this cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa  Chimenti

customer_reviews.title: the face-wash like, burned my face
customer_reviews.text: I am mostly posting as a warning. I have a really hard time finding products that don't turn my face red. I bought this because the rose gel moisturizer has been working for me. But this is not a guarantee of success, the face-wash like, burned my face. Way worse than clearasil or anything like that. So if you have trouble finding face wash that works with your skin, don't test your luck on this one...
customer_reviews.author: CAITLIN

customer_reviews.title: ... Fresh Soy Products for quite a while now and like them very much
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Fresh Soy Products for quite a while now and like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: frustrated

customer_reviews.title: gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a while now and like it. It is gentle, and keeps my face moist. I like the fact I can use around my eyes too.Great for use morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I love this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. I have very sensitive skin and this product does wonders for my skin. I have used for years and will use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan LS Castleton

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for sensitive skin! It doesn't dry you out but gets all of your makeup off. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use retin-A on my skin and this cleanser is gentle enough to be combined with it. It is on the pricey side, but the larger bottle lasts me about 6 months for 1-2 washes/day. They also use better quality ingredients that do not dry out my skin or make me break out. I definitely recommend sampling this product to see if it is for you.
customer_reviews.author: cars

customer_reviews.title: Love this facewash
customer_reviews.text: My favs: Smell - it is just such a refreshing cucumber smell. Reminds me of being at a spa every time I wash my face. Cleaning power - definitely removes my makeup and leaves me clean but not over drying. Dislikes: Wish the price was a little lower but I do feel like the bottle will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ray-Ray

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to wash off. It’s very gentle, yet can get it in your eye and can’t feel anything, but it’s strong enough to remove all make up, Including eye make it. It’s a tiny, tiny bit drying for me.
customer_reviews.author: Betty I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wash
customer_reviews.text: I thought I knew lots about face washes...until I received a sample and realized what I had missed with all the old tried and true. This has a fresh scent, takes off makeup and leaves the skin dewy and really clean feeling.
customer_reviews.author: teachinggirl

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash!!
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash ever! I have very sensitive skin. I’ve been using this for years!! It leaves a very clean feeling!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Leshinskie

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Can't be without this cleanser! I have sensitive skin and this cleanser is so gentle and moisturizing. My skin never feels tight after cleansing. Removes makeup easily -especially waterproof mascara. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I've been having issues with what I think is eczema ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been having issues with what I think is eczema for about a year, but I haven't had time to go to the doctor. Within a week, the issue seems to have cleared up. So, kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One in a million
customer_reviews.text: After trying dozens of face cleansers, my wife has finally come across this one. It doesn't irritate her skin at all so finding this after trying many 'extra gentle' (that weren't quite so gentle on her) is a blessing. Thanks to birchbox for featuring this product, we're now lifetime customers!
customer_reviews.author: EricaMB

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I do not always get out to the department store when I run out of my facial cleaner. I decided to look online to Amazon; and there it is. I was so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser for rosacea. Smells lovely, soy based and leaves skin silky smooth after washing with it. Expensive cleanser but I must say worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: AFOne

customer_reviews.title: ... sensitive skin and had a hard time finding a good cleanser that doesn't make me break out or dry ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and had a hard time finding a good cleanser that doesn't make me break out or dry out my skin. It has a very refreshing, light cucumber scent and my face feels nice and clean after using it. This cleanser is the only cleanser I will use!
customer_reviews.author: Rose  Ingoglia

customer_reviews.title: smells like cucumbers with a light floral note that doesn't bother ...
customer_reviews.text: smells like cucumbers with a light floral note that doesn't bother my sensitive nose. does a great job, is somewhat mild, but does a great job removing the grease and grime of the day.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Ideal face wash
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like it. Been using this product for years and only wish I started using it sooner. It's fresh and easy. Sudsy when starting with a small amount. Priceless for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shirin R. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: nice fragrance and not irritating to the skin
customer_reviews.text: this cleanser is very light weight and washes off all makeup very well. nice fragrance and not irritating to the skin. maybe a little pricey but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: smalltowngirl26

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: you need to try this cleanser, not like any other! skin feels soft and clean after every use, can be used with clarasonic, extra plus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this face cleanser. Leaves my face feeling refreshed and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: excellent item
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cleansers I've ever used in life. It is not very oily and an excellent choice for people who have oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rainn Forrest

customer_reviews.title: good for winter time
customer_reviews.text: The skin soft and clean after use it, good for winter time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter she is very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Casey6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very soft on your delicate face skin! Will rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever used on my face! It removes all makeup, gently cleanses and leaves your face feeling fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: ove it
customer_reviews.text: I like this cleanser very much. Using it for 2-3 years. It is gentle, cleans good and I like its fresh smell. I used to buy it on sephora site,but figured that ordering from Amazon is a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great natural cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleanser for a couple years now and I really like it. It has a fresh cucumber smell and is very gentle on my skin. It is a little pricey, but I think it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: freityanne

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: My skin is extremely sensitive and tends to be dry. It works good, but the smell of it is so bad... I use it everyday and it's hard to get use to this smell. Because of that I will most likely not repurchase this product...
customer_reviews.author: Oliwia

customer_reviews.title: This is the best facewash and I have stuck with it for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best facewash and I have stuck with it for the last 2.5 years! I love that it removes makeup so well too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P

customer_reviews.title: good product bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike the smell of this product. But it does seem to clean my face well without drying it out or stripping natural oils. I like it but Im not sure I'll buy it again because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: ana lorena caywood

product_meta.title: Fresh Cleanser, 150ml Soy Face Cleanser for Women
product_meta.description: Multi-functions & fortified with soy proteins & botanicals Helps cleanse, remove makeup, dirt & impurities Promotes moisture retention, elasticity & firmness Soothing cucumber extract & rose water Gives refreshing & toning cream gel texture Perfec
feature_bullets: Multi-functions & fortified with soy proteins & botanicals
Helps cleanse, remove makeup, dirt & impurities
Gives refreshing & toning cream gel texture
